text: Youth Sports Festival is an East German sports documentary film about the athletics competition featured at the 3rd World Festival of Youth and Students held in Berlin in 1951. It was released in 1951 and was directed by Andrew Thorndike and Dmitri Vasilyev. ==External links== * Category:1951 films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Andrew Thorndike Category:Films directed by Dmitri Vasilyev
title: Youth Sports Festival
